name: Experiment #31415 - The Takeover
description:
Welcome to a very interesting experiment

This experiment revolves around a newly made virus, which is able to take control of a human being, so that another person from a different reality could control them with their fingertips, therefor - The Takeover.

Your goal in this game is simple - Don't let the virus die. It will die if its host dies. It will die if its host is healed. You will do what you must to *keep the virus alive*.

This game was made for Ludum Dare #46 with the theme being "Keep it Alive"

Move with the arrow keys, use Z and X to take over people and attack them (In-Game tutorial included :slight_smile:)

This game was made using the [LibGDX](https://libgdx.badlogicgames.com/) framework and the following tools:
Sprites - Aseprite
Sound Effects - Audacity
Music - Bosca Ceoil
IDE - Intellij IDEA

*System Requirements:*
To run the game you must have Java 8+ installed.
